level.heading: Cross references
level.text: Horizontal property regimes, tax exemptions, classification, see § 42-2016.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 7-29
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.01a.

level.heading: Editor’s notes
level.text: Section 5(a) of D.C. Law 7-29 redesignated this section as § 47-1801.1a (§ 47-1801.01a, 2001 Ed.).
